SELECT r.report_id, r.user_id, r2.user_id AS user_id2, h.report_date ,h.report_result,h.result_date FROM report r LEFT JOIN report_id r2 ON r.report_id = r2.report_id LEFT JOIN history h ON r.report_id = h.report_id ORDER BY r.report_id desc
